data.lyric:
[ti:I Hope]
[ar:Gabby Barrett]
[al:I Hope]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]I Hope - Gabby Barrett
[00:06.50]Lyrics by：Gabby Barrett/Zachary Kale/Jon Nite
[00:13.01]I I hope she makes you smile
[00:18.44]The way you made me smile on the other end of a phone
[00:22.25]In the middle of a highway driving alone
[00:25.23]Oh baby I I hope you hear a song
[00:31.25]That makes you sing along and gets you thinking about her
[00:35.01]Then the last several miles turns into a blur yeah
[00:38.86]I hope you both feel the sparks by the end of the drive
[00:41.98]I hope you know she's the one by the end of the night
[00:45.26]I hope you never ever felt more free
[00:47.80]Tell your friends that you're so happy
[00:51.77]I hope she comes along and wrecks every one of your plans
[00:54.84]I hope you spend your last dime to put a rock on her hand
[00:57.98]I hope she's wilder than your wildest dreams
[01:00.43]She's everything you're ever gonna need
[01:03.21]And then I hope she cheats like you did on me
[01:09.71]And then I hope she cheats like you did on me
[01:16.04]Yeah then I hope she shows up in a 2 am pic from her friend
[01:20.65]Hanging on to a guy and you just ain't him
[01:23.71]I hope you stay up all night all alone waiting by the phone
[01:27.62]And then she calls
[01:29.22]And baby I I hope you work it out
[01:35.34]Forgive and just about forget and take her on a first date again
[01:40.41]And when you lean in for a kiss
[01:42.92]I hope you both feel the sparks by the end of the drive
[01:45.96]I hope you know she's the one by the end of the night
[01:49.19]I hope you never ever felt more free
[01:51.84]Tell your friends that you're so happy
[01:55.69]I hope she comes along and wrecks every one of your plans
[01:58.85]I hope you spend your last dime to put a rock on her hand
[02:02.02]I hope she's wilder than your wildest dreams
[02:04.50]She's everything you're ever gonna need
[02:07.25]And then I hope she cheats like you did on me
[02:13.68]And then I hope she cheats like you did on me
[02:20.48]I hope what goes comes all the way around
[02:26.82]I hope she makes you feel the same way
[02:28.99]About her that I feel about you right now
[02:34.11]I hope you both feel the sparks by the end of the drive
[02:37.22]I hope you know she's the one by the end of the night
[02:40.48]I hope you never ever felt more free
[02:43.07]Tell your friends that you're so happy
[02:46.84]I hope she comes along and wrecks every one of your plans
[02:50.08]I hope you spend your last dime to put a rock on her hand
[02:53.22]I hope she's wilder than your wildest dreams
[02:55.75]She's everything you're ever gonna need
[02:58.44]And then I hope she cheats like you did on me
[03:04.91]And then I hope she cheats like you did on me
[03:14.14]Like you did on me
data.trans:
[ti:I Hope]
[ar:Gabby Barrett]
[al:I Hope]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:06.50]//
[00:13.01]我希望她能让你绽放笑容
[00:18.44]就像你曾在电话的另一端逗我开心
[00:22.25]在高速公路的中央 独自一人驾车行驶
[00:25.23]宝贝 我希望你能听到一首心仪的歌曲
[00:31.25]会让你轻声跟唱 会让你思念着她
[00:35.01]让最后的几公里变得轻松快乐
[00:38.86]我希望你们彼此都能在行程结束时 感受到心动的火花
[00:41.98]我希望你知道她会在深夜时相伴左右
[00:45.26]我希望你能感到自由自在 无拘无束
[00:47.80]会与朋友分享你现在的幸福
[00:51.77]我希望她会出现你身边 破坏你每个计划
[00:54.84]我希望你会为她购买钻戒而倾家荡产
[00:57.98]我希望她比你疯狂的梦想还要狂野 难以掌握
[01:00.43]她就是你所需要的一切
[01:03.21]然后我希望她会劈腿 如同你对我的背叛
[01:09.71]然后我希望她会劈腿 如同你对我的背叛
[01:16.04]我希望在深夜 她的身影出现在朋友的照片里
[01:20.65]她与另一名男子紧紧相拥
[01:23.71]我希望你会彻夜苦守在电话旁
[01:27.62]等待着她与你联络
[01:29.22]宝贝 我希望你可以解决这一切
[01:35.34]你会原谅她的错误 选择遗忘 再度与她约会
[01:40.41]然后俯身与她亲吻
[01:42.92]我希望你们彼此都能在行程结束时 感受到心动的火花
[01:45.96]我希望你知道她会在深夜时相伴左右
[01:49.19]我希望你能感到自由自在 无拘无束
[01:51.84]会与朋友分享你现在的幸福
[01:55.69]我希望她会出现你身边 破坏你每个计划
[01:58.85]我希望你会为她购买钻戒而倾家荡产
[02:02.02]我希望她比你疯狂的梦想还要狂野 难以掌握
[02:04.50]她就是你所需要的一切
[02:07.25]然后我希望她会劈腿 如同你对我的背叛
[02:13.68]然后我希望她会劈腿 如同你对我的背叛
[02:20.48]我希望你会得到因果报应
[02:26.82]我希望她能让你品尝苦果
[02:28.99]让你体会你曾对我的伤害
[02:34.11]我希望你们彼此都能在行程结束时 感受到心动的火花
[02:37.22]我希望你知道她会在深夜时相伴左右
[02:40.48]我希望你能感到自由自在 无拘无束
[02:43.07]会与朋友分享你现在的幸福
[02:46.84]我希望她会出现你身边 破坏你每个计划
[02:50.08]我希望你会为她购买钻戒而倾家荡产
[02:53.22]我希望她比你疯狂的梦想还要狂野 难以掌握
[02:55.75]她就是你所需要的一切
[02:58.44]然后我希望她会劈腿 如同你对我的背叛
[03:04.91]然后我希望她会劈腿 如同你对我的背叛
[03:14.14]如同你对我的背叛
